text: This is a list of prime ministers of Benin (formerly Dahomey) since the formation of the post of Prime Minister in 1960, to its abolition in 2016. ==Key== ;Political parties * * * * ;Other factions * * ;Status * == Affiliations == FARD Front d'Action pour le Rénouveau et le Développement :(Action for Renewal and Development) centrist PD Parti Démocratique :(Democratic Party) merger of PRD and UDD 1964 PRB Parti de la renaissance du Bénin :(Benin Rebirth Party) centrist UTRD Union pour le Triomphe du Renouvellement Démocratique :(Union for the Triumph of the Democratic Renewal) PRD Parti du Rénouveau Démocratique :(Democratic Renewal Party) PRPB Parti de la Révolution Populaire du Bénin :(People's Revolutionary Party of Benin) communist, only legal party 1979-1990 RDD Rassemblement Démocratique du Dahomé :(Dahomey Democratic Rally) UDD Union Démocratique du Dahomé :(Dahomey Democratic Union) Mil Military n-p non-partisan ;Key Political parties * * * * * Other factions * * Status * ==Heads of Government of Benin== (Dates in italics indicate de facto continuation of office) Portrait Name Term of office Political affiliation President(s) Republic of Dahomey 1 Sourou-Migan Apithy, rowspan="3" 2 Coutoucou Hubert Maga, rowspan="3" 3 Christophe Soglo, 4 Justin Ahomadegbé-Tomêtin, (3) Christophe Soglo, 5 Iropa Maurice Kouandété, 6 Émile Derlin Henri Zinsou, (5) Iropa Maurice Kouandété, 7 Paul-Émile de Souza, (2) Coutoucou Hubert Maga, (4) Justin Ahomadegbé-Tomêtin, Mathieu Kérékou, People's Republic of Benin (8) Mathieu Kérékou, Republic of Benin (République du Benin) (8) Ahmed Mathieu Kérékou, 9 rowspan="2" Nicéphore Dieudonné Soglo, Nicéphore Dieudonné Soglo, 10 Adrien Houngbédji, (8) Mathieu Ahmed Kérékou, 11 Thomas Yayi Boni, 12 Pascal Koupaki, (11) Thomas Yayi Boni, 13 Lionel Zinsou 14 Patrice Talon 6 April 2016 to Incumbent n-p ==Other websites== *World Statesmen (Benin) * Benin Prime Ministers
title: List of prime ministers of Benin
